definition: estuary/coastal inlet/river mouth/seaport/see also 誇海口|夸海口[kua1 hai3 kou3]
Haikou prefecture-level city and capital of Hainan Province 海南省[Hai3 nan2 Sheng3]
ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous
surname Hai
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
Haikou prefecture-level city and capital of Hainan Province 海南省[Hai3 nan2 Sheng3]
see 誇海口|夸海口[kua1 hai3 kou3]
to boast/to talk big
estuary

sentences.english: The leaders of the city always boast that the city is the most suitable place for human beings to live.
sentences.chinese: 海口市当局总是吹嘘这个城市最适合人类居住。

sentences.english: There’s no doubt that law schools have overbuilt and that the legal profession has overpromised.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，法学院过多了，并对法定职业夸下海口。

sentences.english: Palmer, who created the company Blue Star Line last year, declined to make a similar boast.
sentences.chinese: 去年创立蓝星航运公司的帕尔默不愿夸下这样的海口。

sentences.english: A city of northern poland near the mouth of the vistula .
sentences.chinese: 波兰北部一城市，位于维斯杜拉河入海口。

sentences.english: Bill will promise you the moon, but he won't live up to his promises.
sentences.chinese: 比尔会为你夸下海口，但他是不会兑现承诺的。

sentences.english: Three Grand Prizes1. The winning designs will be realized on the golf course at Mission Hills ▪ Haikou.
sentences.chinese: 获奖设计将会被用于海口观澜湖的球场上。

sentences.english: Its nearest seaports are in Guangdong Province and Guangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 出海口主要是中国广东和广西。

sentences.english: How long does it take to go to Sanya from Haikou by bus?
sentences.chinese: 从海口坐公车去三亚要多长时间？

sentences.english: Obiective To study the psychology status of heroin addicts in Haikou city.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解海口市海洛因依赖者心理健康状况。

sentences.english: The city straddles the river Glomma where it meets the North Sea.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市格洛马河它位于的入海口。

sentences.english: Two river entrances to the sea, one in the east, one in the west, across four longitudes.
sentences.chinese: 两个入海口，一东一西，跨越四个经度。

sentences.english: Haikou, Yueyang, ranked second and third places.
sentences.chinese: 海口，岳阳则分别位居第二，第三位。

sentences.english: My mission was to travel the length of the Amazon, from source to mouth.
sentences.chinese: 我计划走完亚马逊河全程，从源头一直到入海口。

sentences.english: Yangpu to Haikou, also stepped up to create a one-hour road traffic circle .
sentences.chinese: 洋浦还在加紧打造至海口的一小时公路交通圈。

sentences.english: Haikou, the capital of Hainan Province, is in the northeast of the island.
sentences.chinese: 海口市是海南省省会，它位于海南岛的东北部。

sentences.english: The river runneth softly to the sea.

definition: Hainan Province, in the South China Sea, short name 瓊|琼[Qiong2], capital Haikou 海口/Hainan Island/Hainan District of Wuhai City 烏海市|乌海市[Wu1 hai3 Shi4], Inner Mongolia/Hainan Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 海南藏族自治州[Hai3 nan2 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

Qiongzhong Li and Miao autonomous county, Hainan
Nanchang prefecture level city and capital of Jiangxi province 江西省 in southeast China/also Nanchang county
Liuzhou prefecture-level city in Guangxi
Wanning City, Hainan
